thread.title: Music Choice To Air Non-Stop Halloween Music & Halloween Hits Videos
thread.title_full: Music Choice To Air Non-Stop Halloween Music & Halloween Hits Videos - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Music Choice To Air Non-Stop Halloween Music & Halloween Hits Videos
text:
October 8- November 1st on Music Choice Sounds of the Seasons Channel & On Demand
New York, NY (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Music Choice will play non-stop HALLOWEEN music on its Sounds of the Seasons Music Channel starting today through Sunday, November 1, 2015. The channel is the perfect complement for seasonal parties and activities such as pumpkin carving, haunted houses, and costume parties.
Tune in to hear the most popular Halloween tunes including: “Monster Mash” Bobby ‘Boris’ Pickett; “Witch Doctor” Sha-Na-Na version; “The Addams Family” Original TV theme ; “Ghostbusters” Ray Parker Jr.; “Worms Crawl In” Robert J. Walsh; “Witches Brew” Robert J Walsh; “Over At Frankenstein’s Place” Rocky Horror Picture Show and many more! All of the above songs and more Halloween classics will be played non-stop on now through November 1st. To locate the Sounds of the Seasons Music Channel, check your local TV provider listings.
Additionally, Music Choice On Demand will have a special Halloween themed video Playlist entitled “Halloween Hits” from October 19-November 1st. Videos featured in the playlists will be medley of Halloween videos including: “Thriller” Michael Jackson; "Disturbia" Rihanna; "Paranoid" Ty Dolla $ign; “Wall to Wall” Chris Brown; “Sweet Dreams” Marilyn Manson; “Somebody’s Watching Me” Rockwell, “Bad Blood” Bastille, “Dragula” Rob Zombie and many more!
Directional: MC On Demand>Halloween Hits
For more information on Music Choice, log on to http://www.MusicChoice.com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13012696.htm
